snippet: A new commission created by Gov. Andrew Cuomo should investigate the link between campaign contributions and legislation.
abstract: Editorial praises New York Gov Andrew Cuomo for creating the Moreland Commission to Investigate Public Corruption, following through on his warning to legislators should they fail to pass crucial reforms, including public financing of political campaigns; expresses hope that commission may finally shame lawmakers into doing what is right, not what is merely lucrative.
lead_paragraph: A new commission created by Gov. Andrew Cuomo should investigate the link between campaign contributions and legislation.
